subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: On a day of risk taking and harrowing descents, Froome kept his lead but his teammate Geraint Thomas hit a telephone pole and rode into a ditch after being bumped.
snippet: On a day of risk taking and harrowing descents, Froome kept his lead but his teammate Geraint Thomas hit a telephone pole and rode into a ditch after being bumped.
